column6: I am in love with these pants! They are super comfortable and the design turns heads. Every time I wear them, I get asked where they are from! Fit very true to size and flattering. Must buy!
These tights are the best. They are my go to when I'm ready to work up a sweat. Very comfortable. I could live in them!
I have always purchased Align pants but decided to branch out and try these. They are definitely tighter and less flexible material but still comfortable. Will most likely purchase again.

These pants feel and look amazing.
They're higher price tag had me hoping for a wow when i tried them on. but i didn't get that. Instead i contemplated a return. The top panel is very thin and rolls down with movement. Been washed once, with all my other lulu, and already have pilling on the OUTSIDE of my thighs...weird spot for pilling to start (i have bigger thighs and expect the inside thigh to pill) and the threads are starting to shred. They are comfortable so there is that...
column19: {'LL_response_content': 'Dear Averagemom,\n\nThank you for taking the time to review the Channel Your Energy Tight 28". We want you to know, feedback is at the heart of everything we do and we\'d love to make this experience right for you. We\'d love to learn more and make things right for you, so keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'January 30, 2019'}

column5: Love the leggings!!! Crazy price but worth it!
column6:
Cozy so well made, great fit and cute. What more can you ask for?
In LuLu I am a size 6 even though in everything else I am a size 4 (140 lbs at 5'9"). Definitely need to size up

I love luxtreme leggings. These were cool due to the different pattern- and weren't too overwhelming. Tried them on, loved them so took off the tags and finally wore them this morning for yoga, and a seam in the crotch started to unravel. So disappointed as I had removed the tags. All the other reviews are good on these pants, wondering if i got a defective pair? Leggings this expensive should not be falling apart.
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey BertaAnn,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm sorry to hear your Channel Your Energy Tight is not performing for you. We stand behind our gear and we'd love to get in touch. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'January 29, 2019'}

column6: I saw these in the store and didn’t have my size available. I was excited to see it in stock online and ordered a pair. Unfortunately, the stripes in the legs made me look shorter. They sat too low. These look better on taller people. I’m 5’2 125lbs. Got a size 6. They fit true to size
column19: {'LL_response_content': "Hey Funandplayful,\n\nThanks for taking the time to share your feedback with us. I'm sorry to hear your Channel Your Energy Tight is not performing for you. We stand behind our gear and we'd love to get in touch. Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'January 29, 2019'}

column6: These are one of my favorite leggings I’ve bought from lulu!! They fit true to size & I wish these were available in more colors !!

My most favorite leggings ever! These add some style to your traditional black legging. They are so rad and futuristic looking! I was worried the white stitching and patterns across the thighs would be unflattering with my more muscular/curvy lower half, however; they fit so well and actually accentuated my legs very nicely! They are highwaisted and have a little extra fabric at the ankle but no need to hem on me, I’m 5’5”. The material feels light as a feather and ventilates well while woring out. Everyone always comments on them when I wear them. They’re definitely unique and eye catching, just love them!
Ce pantalon fait très très bien.Tout les lignes sont mises à la bonne place et font un super beau look.
Nice weight and style, well made. Size down if you're between sizes.

This is my first Lululemon purchase and I was not disappointed. I've been reluctant to spend this much (>$100) on workout tights, but these did not disappoint. They look athletic, move well, wash well, and are flattering. The compression is perfect and the seams are beautifully designed. I love how the white accent color is sewn in to the fabric (rather than ironed on in a different material) and this allows a little breathability at the seams. I play tennis and have worn these about 5x. I'm about 5'9" and was happy with the length. I've washed and dried them in HE washer/delicate cycle without issue. Very happy with my purchase!
column11: I KEEP MY AGE ON THE D.L.

column6: Love the design of these pants they are definitely really cool! I wish they had side pockets for my phone though for working out st them gym. They do slide down a bit when I run and have to frequently pull them up which gets annoying. I wish the waistband was thicker and tighter. I bought my regular size (8) and have many other lulu pants without this problem.

Keep an eye out for an email coming your way. Chat Soon!', 'LL_response_date': 'January 19, 2019'}

column6: Good comfortable fit

Unfortunately, not flattering as the pants I bought in the past .
Everlux etc.

We stand behind our gear and we'd love to get in touch. Give us a call at our Guest Education Centre (1.877.263.9300) or jump on Live Chat to speak directly with an educator. We look forward to speaking with you soon!", 'LL_response_date': 'January 19, 2019'}

column6: I own every solid color imaginable. This was a breath of fresh air. Wonderfully flattering lines and pattern. Luxtreme is amazing as always for sweaty training and Piyo
These tights are amazing. The angle and placement of the lines are very flattering. They add definition in my legs where I would like. The material and fit are perfect.
These are an amazing fit. I love this new pattern. Who doesn’t like black and white together. Nicely done!!
Great tights with very flattering lines!

I usually only wear All The Right Places . Took a chance on these due to the graphic design. I’m so glad I did. They fit true to size and are comfortable even through an intense boxing workout. Great design!

These tights are amazing.
The material feels high quality and the print looks very cute!
Flattering and beautiful on my bootie!
Love these tights! They're compressed/light enough for running. No complaints here! Ordered in my regular size 6.

I just got these tights a couple of weeks ago and have already worn them multiple times for running and Mauy Thai training. I love the bold style and have received compliments on them. They have plenty of stretch to accommodate a wide range of motion and the wide waste band is very comfortable. I would have given them 5 starts, but the 28" length on my 5'4'' frame is just a little longer than I would prefer and the multiple seems across the thigh which give these tights their unique look, also get a little uncomfortable with all day wear.

I love luxtreme bottoms and was looking for a 7/8 inch tight that actually will fit people with skinny ankles. Every single long pair of tights I have to have altered at least 4 inches and then they are capris and not long tights.
Also, the pattern on the tights would be cute on with someone no curves and a stick figure. It is very unflattering on women with curves (and I wear a size 4).
I love lululemon bottoms and think they are worth the money when I find a Luxetreme Capri/bottom that compliments curvy body types and doesn’t have mesh all over the legs. The all “in the right places” crop is also a total “no go” for ladies with curves (pockets on the size of our thighs makes us look twice as wide).

column5: Awesome design that flatters your legs
column6: Whoever designed these leggings need a raise! Im bowlegged and these lines were so flattering on me. It really hugs your legs in all the right places. The best part is its in a material that repels lint and animal fur. Lululemon needs to advertise this material to all pet owners.

column5: So flattering and fit is perfect!
column6: Pants like this are why I fell in love with lululemon in the first place. The lines and seams of these leggings are perfect -- they're so flattering! The sizing is on point -- I struggle sometimes with being between sizes, and I feel like these were made for those of us who are. They are long, but since lululemon offers hemming, I got them shortened to a perfect length for me. My local lululemon store (Merchant's Walk in Huntsville, AL) was so helpful and knowledgeable about the products, and I can't thank them enough for introducing me to these pants! These are quickly becoming some of my favorite leggings to date. Love them! Please make more colors and patterns!

Love the look and feel of these. My legs are quite a bit more muscular and shorter than the 5'9 model pictured yet these still look good. I'm 5'4 so the 28 inch inseam is a touch too long - resulting in 'bagginess' around my skinny ankles (but that's a minimal concern.) Great purchase!

I purchased these 2 days ago and love them! At first I thought maybe they were just a bit over the top because they are kinda different looking---But I found that they give you a boost- You look more athletic instantly (its the white lines that contour your legs) and guess what they make you feel that way! (Isn't that what we are striving for?)
When you look at yourself in the mirror with these workout leggings on -- they give you the desire to want to be more energetic in your workout. Everyone is wearing the plain colored leggings black/green/navy/maroon-- which are great --and I have plenty of those....These just set you apart from the rest of the girls in the gym or at Orange Theory!
They are comfy, love the way it fits my booty --they are a wee-bit long for me but they still work and look awesome! 5'5 -127 lbs.

I bought these pants this morning and already fell in love with them! I have the Fast & Free and Pace Rival and these quickly became my favorite. They feel super light and hold you in tight. I can't say enough about these leggings and was so excited to leave the first review. If you are on the fence, buy these and you won't be disappointed. I'm going to save up for the matching jacket next!!! Awesome product, Lulu!
